channel.title: Help, how can I make pk drops appear to killer
channel.description:
In my server, when you kill someone, their items appear like regular items (takes a while) and then everyone can see them.
How can I make it so the killer can see the person they killed's item.

item.title: Help, how can I make pk drops appear to killer
item.dc:creator: @blackr79 blackr79
item.description:
@blackr79 wrote:

change the timing of when it reappears

tip= it’s in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Help, how can I make pk drops appear to killer
